00024 #include "traverseRoaming.h"
00025 #include "GlobalStatisticsAccess.h"
00026 
00027 traverseRoaming::traverseRoaming(double areaDimension, double speed, NeighborMap *Neighbors, GlobalCoordinator* coordinator, CollisionList* CollisionRect)
00028               :MovementGenerator(areaDimension, speed, Neighbors, coordinator, CollisionRect)
00029 {
00030     target.x = areaDimension;
00031     target.y = areaDimension/2;
00032     position.x = 0;
00033     position.y = areaDimension/2;
00034     direction = target - position;
00035     direction.normalize();
00036 }
00037 
00038 void traverseRoaming::move()
00039 {
00040     if( GlobalStatisticsAccess().get()->isMeasuring() ){
00041         flock();
00042         position += direction * speed;
00043         if(testBounds()) {
00044             position += direction * speed * 2;
00045             testBounds();
00046         }
00047 
00048         if(target.distanceSqr(position) < speed * speed) {
00049             coordinator->endSimulation();
00050         }
00051     }
00052 }
